about-me.title: About me
about-me.description-a: Hi!, I'm Carlos Martínez a web developer specialized in JavaScript, I have more than
about-me.description-b: years of experience in building modern web applications. I am currently
about-me.description-c: years old, I keep learning and improving every day because technology never stops.
about-me.description-d: I specialize more than anything in the MERN stack (mongodb, express, react, node), but I also have knowledge of python and other libraries.
